summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Maya Groom Pro pet grooming appointment app. Backend APIs fully functional (18/18 tests passed). Frontend login, navigation, calendar views, and mobile layout tested successfully.
passed_tests: User registration and login flow - ✅ Working
All backend APIs (auth, clients, services, items, pets, appointments, waitlist, settings) - ✅ 18/18 passed
Calendar page loads with week view by default - ✅ Working
Desktop navigation between pages (Calendar, Customers, Services, Items, Waitlist, Settings) - ✅ Working
Mobile layout - sidebar hidden, bottom navigation visible - ✅ Working
Terracotta theme and styling - ✅ Properly implemented

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all major flows working, minor playwright script issues)
